title: British and Irish Boxing Authority
text:
The British & Irish Boxing Authority (BIBA) is a professional <a href="boxing">boxing</a> governing, sanctioning and licensing organisation that operates primarily within the <a href="United%20Kingdom">United Kingdom</a> and the <a href="Republic%20of%20Ireland">Republic of Ireland</a>.
History.
BIBA was launched in April 2016. In September 2019, it was announced that the authority had sanctioned the comeback fight of <a href="Nigel%20Benn">Nigel Benn</a>, who will take on <a href="Sakio%20Bika">Sakio Bika</a> in Birmingham on 23 November 2019.
